name: False Digdogger
author: Alucard648
description: Blob-like enemy with one eye in the center of the body. Walks around, shooting eweapons. Only hitting his open eye can deal any damage to boss.
setup: 1. Set up 2 enemies, 1 for eye and 1 invincible for body2. Blob`s eye anmimation is handled by code and uses 4 frames, animation should be set to "none".3. Blob`s body must have defenses set to Ignore and uses Damage to handle Link collision.4. Assign atttributes for eye part of boss.Attribute 1: unusedAttribute 2: Delay between opening and closing eyeAttribute 3: Delay between shots, in frames. Enemy won`t fire , if Weapon Damage is 0. -1 - shoot eweapons on opening eye.Attribute 4: Delay between single eweapons in one volley, in frames.Attribute 5: Number of eweapons to fire per burstAttribute 6: ID used by Blob bodyAttribute 7: Eweapon sprite Attribute 8: Tile Width for bodyAttribute 9: Tile Height for body
